#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define min(a,b) (a>b?b:a)
main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    char a[10000],b[10000];
    cin>>a>>b;
    int x=strlen(a);
    int y=strlen(b);
    sort(a,a+x);
    sort(b,b+x);
    //cout<<a<<b;
    if(x==y)
    {
        if(strcmp(a,b)==0)
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    else
        cout<<"NO\n";
}
return 0;
}
